Description: Long string of green glazed composition short cylinder beads, with one paler globular bead.
Curator's comments: Cf. very similar glazed composition disc beads 1926,0728.170 from a dated burial at Abydos.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (305)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1983 Aug-Oct, Stratford, Passmore Edwards Museum, Life & Death in Ancient Egypt
